'''Tavern Carpet - "Passion of Play"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Tavern Carpet - "Passion of Play" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
